website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive and proven successful over time for many people, nasal strips are easy to use.
pros: An anti-snore product that doesn't cost much to try
Has been in the market for a long period of time, but it continues to work well for many people
Easy to apply and wear without causing discomfort during the night
cons: Some people need a more invasive solution, so nasal strips won't work for everyone

customer_reviews.title: They don't stay put all night, and still irritate my skin
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through an entire box, and am very disappointed. I make sure I wash the area carefully (even tried an astringent), apply the strips per the instructions, and the strips only stay put for an hour or two. And the strips still irritate my skin. I wish I hadn't bought four boxes; waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Syndergaard

customer_reviews.title: Great for snorers.
customer_reviews.text: My husband swears by these, he wears one every night. Stops him snoring after an old broken nose injury. If only they were reusable!!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: I would hate to try to sleep without these!
customer_reviews.text: These breath rights are the difference between sleeping and not. I like these (clear, large) because the "glue" seems less "aggressive" than the others and because I have a large nose.
customer_reviews.author: Ace Mcinturff

customer_reviews.title: If you can't find it at Amazon, it does not exist.
customer_reviews.text: They do the job just right. The glue is not so hard when you peel it off in the morning when you get up. I could not find them anywhere around North Richland Hills.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Morales

customer_reviews.title: I breathe so well at night and think it's the best product of it's kind out on the market today
customer_reviews.text: Been using Breathe Right for years and years, starting with the original tan. I now use the clear in the large because they stick really well (as opposed to the small). I find them a lot more sensitive to my fair skin and have never had a problem removing them. I breathe so well at night and think it's the best product of it's kind out on the market today.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Skin saver
customer_reviews.text: Use every night . Doesn’t tear my skin like others do
customer_reviews.author: Trilla Roach

customer_reviews.title: The only type and size that works for me. Hard to find in the stores.
customer_reviews.text: These were a couple of years old but still worked fine. Good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Work
customer_reviews.text: My husband prefers this brand, also the clear breathe rites are more comfortable for his nose skin
customer_reviews.author: Grammie b

customer_reviews.title: Best nasal strip on the market
customer_reviews.text: I've used Breath Right strips for years & their quality is better than any other strips I've tried
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Search no more for large size!
customer_reviews.text: Search no longer for the large size in stores. Here they are, the right brand and the right size.
customer_reviews.author: omusyk

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for allowing the nasal passage to open so you don't breathe through your mouth and get a sore throat.
customer_reviews.author: R. Conover

customer_reviews.title: breathe easy
customer_reviews.text: Husband has used product for years and other similar products do not compare.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Lesica

customer_reviews.title: BREATHE RIGHTS ARE GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product really does open up your nose for easy breathing with NO SIDE EFFECTS, NO MEDICINE AND NO WORRYING ABOUT ALLERGIES TO THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Michael Holt

customer_reviews.title: (120 Strips) Breathe Right Nasal Strips Clear Large For Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: These work just fine for me. They expand the airway as designed. They stay on fine but don't stick enough to remove skin when I take them off. YMMV
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Received exactly what I wanted. Breathe Right nasal strips unclog your nostrils immediately.
customer_reviews.author: joseph giallo

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I have used Breathe Right for several years and this is simply a reorder. The design seems to have changed a bit but still excellent for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Wayward Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great and handy product.
customer_reviews.text: It is so handy to order these on-line. They came in a timely manner. The stores in are area are often out of the clear large so I love ordering them and not having to think about them.
customer_reviews.author: A. English

customer_reviews.title: Efficient.
customer_reviews.text: I knew this product at ten years ago. I use frequently and it1s very efficient. I recomend to the persons that have somme problems with night-breath.
customer_reviews.author: CORREA

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: The product works very well without skin irritation. Breathe Right is very easy to apply and remove. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I sleep better using these... they work. Just wish they were a little less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Out of

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in good order
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for about 6 years to improve my breathing while I sleep. The on-line price is about half the in-store price in Australia, although I don't know about the in-store price in other countries. No complaints about the quality of the product. Arrived as ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Webb

customer_reviews.title: Nasal strips
customer_reviews.text: These are good for anyone with sensitive skin and I forgot from previous use that they lose adhesive throughout the night so I will purchase tan in the future for that reason
customer_reviews.author: Dana Labreck

customer_reviews.title: Sweeeeeeet! I can breath again...
customer_reviews.text: I'm addicted to these things. Our room gets super stuffy in the winter but these do the trick. I actually sleep better using them. NOTE that they actually come in different sizes. WASH YOUR FACE before application and they'll stick way better.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Scanlon

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive Failure
customer_reviews.text: I have used the original BREATHE RIGHT nasal strips and found them to perform satisfactorily. After a few hours from application these new clear strips, as advertised for sensitive skin, no longer adhered sufficiently to hold the nostrils open. When removed they left a slimy residue on my nose. The strips arrived in four boxes, of which I opened one. When contacted, the vendor agreed to replace the unopened boxes, but did not offer to refund either the purchase price or return shipping costs. All things considered, this was a very bad shopping experience. Anyone who feels they need to try these should try to find a small lot offering.
customer_reviews.author: Charles T. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Really good solution to improve breathing then sleeping
customer_reviews.text: This product works well - much better than the tan version, which hurts my skin when removing as the adhesive is too strong on the tan version. I have been using this item every night for several years - it works!
customer_reviews.author: Straight-Talk

customer_reviews.title: Little sticker
customer_reviews.text: They don't stay on your nose all night sometimes. Need to have more sticking power, and I ordered large and they aren't big enough could be a little bit larger. If you get them on in just the right location they work pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Cieslak

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: good except I'm now allergic to the adhesive ....using the sensitive version was still allergic.
customer_reviews.author: gracie

customer_reviews.title: A must for breathing comfortably while I sleep
customer_reviews.text: I tried the newer version which is larger and has stronger adhesives and found them too big and too uncomfortable to remove in the morning so I stay with this version (the medium/large) and they work perfectly. I also tried a store brand and these are definitely the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: PAH

customer_reviews.title: Much to my surprise, these (sort of) work
customer_reviews.text: In an effort to keep my marriage intact, I tried these strips. They effectively do exactly as they promise - keep your nasal passages open. And my snoring was reduced - not eliminated, but toned down. So don’t expect miracles; but I call that a win.
customer_reviews.author: J. Steinbach

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: these definitely work better than the other brands of nasal strips I have tried. I like the clear and often even keep them on partway through the day without being self conscious about wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: DCJ

customer_reviews.title: Breathing with Breathe Right Strips
customer_reviews.text: My husband NEVER goes to bed without his nasal strips. He just can’t breathe without them! And I love that he no longer snores! He only likes the clear ones the others tear his nose up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So good to breathe!!
customer_reviews.text: I use these every night with my bipap machine...without the strip, I cannot breathe with my left nostril...breathing is good!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Ketcham

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these and it was great to find these in bulk to purchase. Great idea and a time saver. Sometimes​ the store I purchase them runs out.
customer_reviews.author: SeraphOne

customer_reviews.title: Breathe Right works fast.
customer_reviews.text: My sister, who also suffers from sinus problems recommended Breathe Right to me, and I'm glad she did. It starts working as soon as I put it on and it keeps my sinuses all night long. It is such a pleasure to finally be able to breathe freely at night. I wholeheartedly recommend this product to anyone who suffers from a sinus condition like I do. I guarantee you that you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Lou D

customer_reviews.title: Not so sticky it hurts to remove.
customer_reviews.text: This product makes it so much easier to breath through the nose all night.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick B.

customer_reviews.title: They don't stick
customer_reviews.text: This used to be a great product, hadn't used in years decided to try again. Maybe 1 in 5 make it through the first couple of hours at night. It seems they have cut corners and have created a product that unfortunately just doesn't work as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Let’s you breathe better
customer_reviews.text: Glue may leave deposit on your nose. Easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Golf 333

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this product better than the original. The original adhesive can take your skin off.
customer_reviews.author: Apotheker

customer_reviews.title: and for me it works better than any of the other nasal strips
customer_reviews.text: they work very well. I believe the adhesive is from 3M, and for me it works better than any of the other nasal strips.
customer_reviews.author: amateur3

customer_reviews.title: Good product fairly priced
customer_reviews.text: I really like these Breathe Right strips. The adhesive on the clear strips don't bother my skin as much. And the extra long ones fit my nose better.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: spot on
customer_reviews.text: i am impressed, easy application, good adhesive, reasonable price and to top it off, they do what they are supposed to!
customer_reviews.author: JBF

customer_reviews.title: product
customer_reviews.text: Product really helps, stays on comfortably, helps for better breathing highly recommend creates much better air flow through the nose
customer_reviews.author: fvm

customer_reviews.title: ... Right strips a lot because they let me sleep better, know this new product does not bother my ...
customer_reviews.text: I use Breath Right strips a lot because they let me sleep better, know this new product does not bother my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Basham

customer_reviews.title: Breathe right strips are great
customer_reviews.text: Good price and work very well. I sleep much better at night and don't snore much at all and feel more rested in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: john e. burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Good night sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I but these when my husband runs out. I know when he don't have them on. They really help with the snoring so I can get some sleep. They are cheaper than the ones in the store where I live. We have tried everything and these seem to help the most. They just fit right over the nose and light weight. My husband said he don't get dry mouth with them. He likes them. And so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have trouble breathing at night, these may be a very low cost and very effictive solution.
customer_reviews.text: If you have any trouble breathing at night, these are a must. Easy to "install"...you just stick them on your nose. Don't worry, they won't come off at night but they will open your nostrils that little bit you need for a smooth night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: RJay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've been using them for years and I sleep like a new born.....
customer_reviews.author: Luciano Roma

customer_reviews.title: but I dislike them. They itch
customer_reviews.text: I need them, but I dislike them. They itch, they leave adhesive on my nose, or they leave red marks. But they work.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hansell

customer_reviews.title: Breath Right Nasal Strips
customer_reviews.text: These really work. My husband has snored for years and since he has begun using these strips he no longer snores. Now I get a good night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Super mom

product_meta.title: (120 Strips) Breathe Right Nasal Strips Clear Large for Sensitive Skin
product_meta.description: (120 Strips) Breathe Right Nasal Strips Clear Large For Sensitive Skin
feature_bullets: You will receive 4 of the 30 count boxes.
Opens your nose to reduce snoring and nasal congestion
